ingredients: +   3/4 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon instant hot chocolate mix, 3  bananas, peeled, 1 large fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and diced,   +   1/4 cup milk, 2  eggs, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 2 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts (Optional), 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 4g 21%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 279mg 12%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 6mg 28%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 137mg 3%
